data.name: ActionsDesc
data.value: Select an item to add, edit, or delete and etc...

data.name: SelectTargetItem
data.value: Select Target Item to move to

data.name: Convention
data.value: Convention: Group configurations should be placed under the node’s UserControls

data.name: ExtractState
data.value: If an existing group configuration is available, you can extract it.

data.name: ProjectSubject
data.value: Provide a visual interface to configure grouping and pagination for DaVinci templates.

data.name: MultiDragDropDesc
data.value: Currently, only single-item drag-and-drop is supported. Although a batch move feature is available, it still causes considerable inconvenience. Support for multi-item drag-and-drop will be provided in future updates.

data.name: ExportGlobalDesc
data.value: Currently, public parameters and group configurations must be exported separately and then copied and pasted into the template for them to take effect. In future updates, we plan to support directly exporting the entire template file.

data.name: LivePreviewDesc
data.value: By combining public parameters and group configurations, this feature generates layout settings for grouping and pagination consistent with the template’s Inspector panel, providing a more intuitive preview experience.

data.name: GroupNodeRemind
data.value: ⚠️Please enter the Group Node Name in the Group Source page before matching.

data.name: SearchTypeRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please select a search type first

data.name: SearchContentRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please enter the search content first.

data.name: ParasEmptyRemind
data.value: ⚠️ There are currently no published parameter items.

data.name: SyncGroupsRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Synchronization will only add group configuration items that do not exist in the public parameters. Are you sure you want to proceed?

data.name: GroupsEmptyRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please ensure that the group configuration items in the source page are not empty.

data.name: SelectItemRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please select an item first before performing this action.

data.name: SelectItemsRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please select one or more items before performing this action.

data.name: ReOrderRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please select the items you want to move.

data.name: ReorderTargetRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please select the target item to move to.

data.name: TemplateFileRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Please import the correct template file first.

data.name: LoadRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Initialize loading of published parameters (all existing configurations and operations will be reset).

data.name: GroupNodeEmptyRemind
data.value: ⚠️ The group node name cannot be empty.

data.name: GroupNodeTypeEmptyRemind
data.value: ⚠️ The group node type cannot be empty.

data.name: DeleteRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to delete the selected item(s)?

data.name: GroupDumplicateRemind
data.value: ⚠️ Group name is duplicated. Failed to add.
